resources.string: Retry with this new digit code

concept:(hello) [hello hi hey "good morning" greetings]
 concept:(can_you) ["[can will could] you {please}""do you think you could""are you [ready able] to""do you know how to"]
 concept:(i_want_to) ["I ["want to" wanna]"]
 concept:(want_to) ["[want wish "would [like love]"] to" wanna "need {to}"]
 concept:(restart_application) ["[restart "start {again}" reboot replay launch] {this the that} {software app application program dialog topic activity}" "go back to the [beginning start]""rewind please"]
